interactionMessages.message: Alcohol increases the risk of facial flushing and skin irritation when given with topical Tacrolimus. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

interactionMessages.message: Alcohol potentially causes a disulfiram-like reaction when given with Tinidazole. Manufacturer advises avoid for 72 hours stopping treatment.

interactionMessages.message: Alcohol (in those who drink heavily) potentially decreases the anticoagulant effect of Warfarin. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.
